nodes.bodyText: As stated before on Discord, the condition and void method should not be on the same line.

commit.message: Put the conditions and methods on separate lines

nodes.bodyText: the IF statement should be on it's own line
Can you put this statement into a switch?
Oh, also, can you switch these to for loops (based on other PRs / feedback to stay consistent)?
The switch statement should have a default case that asserts false
